trans-unit.source: Specifies a component that creates an icon in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 指定在通知區域建立圖示的元件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Icons in the notification area are shortcuts to processes that are running in the background of a computer, such as a virus protection program or a volume control.
trans-unit.target: 通知區域中的圖示是電腦的捷徑，例如防毒程式或音量控制背景中執行的處理序。

trans-unit.source: These processes do not come with their own user interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這些程序不會隨附自己的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: The NotifyIcon class provides a way to program in this functionality.
trans-unit.target: NotifyIcon 類別程式的方法以提供這項功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A> property defines the icon that appears in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>屬性會定義會出現在通知區域的圖示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pop-up menus for an icon are addressed with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 快顯功能表圖示會與定址<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ContextMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A> property assigns ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>屬性指定工具提示文字。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: In order for the icon to show up in the notification area, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 為了讓在通知區域中顯示的圖示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>屬性必須設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>建立時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property to `true` in order to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> you created.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>屬性`true`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>您所建立。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 它的容器釋放回收之前，將會存在此執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref> class with the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>類別使用指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> is created, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>建立時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A> property to `true` in order to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> you created.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>屬性`true`才能使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>您所建立。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: This instance will exist until its container releases it to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 它的容器釋放回收之前，將會存在此執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that represents the container for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> ，代表為容器<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the balloon tip is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 當按一下氣球提示時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the balloon tip is closed by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者關閉氣球提示時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display on the balloon tip associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要與相關聯之氣球提示上顯示的圖示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"></xref> to display on the balloon tip associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"> </xref>與相關聯之氣球提示上顯示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the balloon tip is displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 螢幕上所顯示的氣球提示時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display on the balloon tip associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要與相關聯之氣球提示上顯示的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the balloon tip associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 與相關聯之氣球提示上顯示的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title of the balloon tip displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定上顯示的氣球提示標題<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon.
trans-unit.target: 標題文字會顯示在氣球頂端附近的粗體字型。

trans-unit.source: The text to display as the title of the balloon tip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示為汽球提示標題的文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks the icon in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下通知區域中的圖示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the icon.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖示的捷徑功能表。

trans-unit.source: The menu is shown when the user right-clicks an icon in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下工作列的通知區域中的圖示時，就會顯示功能表。

trans-unit.source: Shortcut menus also are known as pop-up menus.
trans-unit.target: 快顯功能表也稱為快顯功能表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> for the icon.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref>圖示。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與相關聯的捷徑功能表<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>與相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下工作列通知區域中的圖示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current icon.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的圖示。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>顯示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>元件。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按一下<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 發生於指標位於工作列的通知區域中的圖示上時，使用者按下滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user moves the mouse while the pointer is over the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者將滑鼠指標位於工作列的通知區域中的圖示上時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user releases the mouse button while the pointer is over the icon in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 發生於指標位於工作列的通知區域中的圖示上時，使用者放開滑鼠按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Displays a balloon tip in the taskbar for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: 指定的期間，於工作列中顯示氣球提示。

trans-unit.source: Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 最小值和最大逾時值強制執行的作業系統，並且通常 10 和 30 秒，分別為，不過這會視作業系統而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 逾時值太大或太小會調整為適當的最小值或最大值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果使用者不會使用這台電腦 （沒有鍵盤或滑鼠事件發生） 然後系統不會計算此逾時間。

trans-unit.source: Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個氣球提示可以顯示在工作列上，一次。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試顯示的氣球提示，當其中一個目前顯示在工作列原因`timeout`值被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application.
trans-unit.target: 行為會稍有不同，取決於作業系統及氣球提示是否從另一個，或相同的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: 值為何，第二個出現之前從另一個應用程式的第二個的汽球提示時，第一個的汽球提示會顯示的最小逾時值`timeout`。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A> method is made.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，如果的氣球提示是從相同的應用程式，第一個汽球提示立即關閉當另一個呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A>方法由。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon.ShowBalloonTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下第二個註解方塊會開啟第一個球形文字說明之上。

trans-unit.source: The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon.
trans-unit.target: 標題文字會顯示在氣球頂端附近的粗體字型。

trans-unit.source: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位，氣球提示應該顯示的時段。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，這個參數已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.
trans-unit.target: 通知的顯示時間現在會根據系統的協助工具設定。

trans-unit.source: timeout is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: timeout小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Displays a balloon tip with the specified title, text, and icon in the taskbar for the specified time period.
trans-unit.target: 指定的期間，於工作列中顯示具有指定的標題、 文字和圖示的氣球提示。

trans-unit.source: Minimum and maximum timeout values are enforced by the operating system and are typically 10 and 30 seconds, respectively, however this can vary depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 最小值和最大逾時值強制執行的作業系統，並且通常 10 和 30 秒，分別為，不過這會視作業系統而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Timeout values that are too large or too small are adjusted to the appropriate minimum or maximum value.
trans-unit.target: 逾時值太大或太小會調整為適當的最小值或最大值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the user does not appear to be using the computer (no keyboard or mouse events are occurring) then the system does not count this time towards the timeout.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果使用者不會使用這台電腦 （沒有鍵盤或滑鼠事件發生） 然後系統不會計算此逾時間。

trans-unit.source: Only one balloon tip can display on the taskbar at a time.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個氣球提示可以顯示在工作列上，一次。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to display a balloon tip when one is currently displayed on the taskbar causes the `timeout` value to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試顯示的氣球提示，當其中一個目前顯示在工作列原因`timeout`值被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is slightly different depending on the operating system and whether the balloon tip is from another, or the same, application.
trans-unit.target: 行為會稍有不同，取決於作業系統及氣球提示是否從另一個，或相同的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: When the second balloon tip is from another application, the first balloon tip will display for the minimum timeout value before the second appears, regardless of the value of `timeout`.
trans-unit.target: 值為何，第二個出現之前從另一個應用程式的第二個的汽球提示時，第一個的汽球提示會顯示的最小逾時值`timeout`。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if the balloon tips are from the same application, the first balloon tip immediately closes when another call to the ShowBalloonTip method is made.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，如果汽球提示是來自相同的應用程式中，第一個的汽球提示立即關閉另一個 ShowBalloonTip 方法呼叫時。

trans-unit.source: In some cases the second balloon will open on top of the first balloon.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下第二個註解方塊會開啟第一個球形文字說明之上。

trans-unit.source: The title text will display in a bold font near the top of the balloon.
trans-unit.target: 標題文字會顯示在氣球頂端附近的粗體字型。

trans-unit.source: The time period, in milliseconds, the balloon tip should display.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位，氣球提示應該顯示的時段。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is deprecated as of Windows Vista.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，這個參數已被取代。

trans-unit.source: Notification display times are now based on system accessibility settings.
trans-unit.target: 通知的顯示時間現在會根據系統的協助工具設定。

trans-unit.source: The title to display on the balloon tip.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示之氣球提示上的標題。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the balloon tip.
trans-unit.target: 氣球提示上顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTipIcon"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: timeout is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: timeout小於 0。

trans-unit.source: tipText is or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: tipText是或空字串。

trans-unit.source: tipIcon is not a member of .
trans-unit.target: tipIcon不是成員的 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，包含有關資料<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>資料包含關於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當滑鼠指標停留在通知區域圖示上時顯示的工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: If the text is `null`, no ToolTip is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字是`null`，會顯示任何工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer rests on a notification area icon.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠指標停留在通知區域圖示上時顯示工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: ToolTip text is more than 63 characters long.
trans-unit.target: 工具提示文字是超過 63 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the icon is visible in the notification area of the taskbar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示圖示在工作列的通知區域中。

trans-unit.source: Since the default value is `false`, in order for the icon to show up in the notification area, you must set the Visible property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 由於預設值為`false`，為了讓在通知區域中顯示的圖示，您必須設定 Visible 屬性為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the icon is visible in the notification area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果圖示會顯示在通知區域中。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
